title: Sun-Dried Tomato Sauce
introduction: This Sun-Dried Tomato Sauce is a delightful addition to a variety of dishes. Perfect for drizzling over steaks, cold roast beef, or pork, it also serves as an elegant topping for a log of mild goat cheese in antipasto. Rich in flavor, this sauce combines the tanginess of balsamic vinegar with the savory depth of sun-dried tomatoes.
ingredients: 1/2 cup drained marinated sun-dried tomatoes, very finely chopped
instructions: In a medium bowl, whisk together all of the ingredients.
Let stand 1 hour at room temperature before serving.
Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator up to 2 days.
